404.title: Page not found
404.description: Sorry we are not able to find this resource! You could just press this neat little button:

title.default: DONUT is made for you to chat about your interests and engage your communities!
title.landing: DONUT - Instant chat about your interests
title.profile: __subtitle__'s profile - DONUT is made for you to chat about your interests and engage your communities!

landing.title: Chat about what you like!
landing.description: On DONUT chat with fun people who share your passions. This is the great return of chat rooms!

description.room: Join me on DONUT.me, the new colorful thematic chat platform. I discuss on __name__ and it would be nice if you join us.
description.user: This is my profile page on DONUT.me, the new colorful thematic chat platform. It would be nice to see you on DONUT.

login.title: connect
login.passworderror: Your forgot to enter a password

forgot.sent: A e-mail was sent to __email__ with instructions.
forgot.success: Success! Your password was successfully reset.

error.notexists: No account with that email address exists.
error.expired: Please restart the process. This token has expired or has already been used.

signup.disclaimer: by clicking the "Here we go!" button I accepte the user terms and conditions of DONUT.

choose-username.title: It's time to choose a username!
choose-username.description: This username will be your identity on DONUT and will be public. You cannot edit it later.
help: Valid : letters, numbers and special characters: -._|^
Invalid: spaces, accents and special characters not listed above.
choose-username.usernameerror: This username does not match constraints
choose-username.usernameexists: This username is already taken by someone else.

connect-local.title: Create a password
connect-local.description: Add an-email and a password to your account

edit-email.title: Change your e-mail
edit-email.info: Enter the new e-mail you will use to log in to DONUT:

edit-password.title: Change your password
edit-password.info: Enter a new password and confirm it:

description.definition:
A donut is a cosy discussion spot,
a cool place to hang out,
a chat room indeed!
description.line1: You can create your very own customized donut and hang out with you community...
description.line2: ...or join ongoing discussions around your interests...
description.line3: ...and discover like-minded people, during true conversations!

logged.title: Already logged in
logged.text: You are already logged in, enter DONUT:

disclaimer.before: This page is the profile of the donut
disclaimer.after: on the chat platform DONUT.me. On DONUT.me you can join or create a thematic chat room (a donut) about whatever you like. You can chat with people who share your interests.

room.editlink: To edit this profile click here

disclaimer.before: This page is the profile of the user
disclaimer.after: on the chat platform DONUT.me. On DONUT.me you can join or create a thematic chat room (a donut) about whatever you like. You can chat with people who share your interests.

user.editlink: To edit this profile click here

bannedMessage.onetoone: You have been locked by this user
bannedMessage.room: You have been locked in this Room

create.info: Attention, the donut name will not be editable later.
create.label: Create your donut
help: Valid : letters, numbers and special characters: -._|^
Invalid: spaces, accents and special characters not listed above.

home.roomstitle: Here are the existing donuts, you can also create one:

search.roomstitle: Here are the donuts matching your request, you can also create one :

topic.label: Currently
topic.placeholder: Enter the conversation topic, the mood,...
topic.default: No topic, click here to edit

owner.is: This user is the creator of this donut.

op.is: This user is the moderator of this donut.

confirmation.placeholder: Explain why, visible in this donut (optional)

notifications.disconnected: You have been disconnected from the server, please wait
notifications.offline: This user is currently offline, the message cannot be sent.
notifications.kick: was kicked out of this donut by
notifications.ban: was banned from this donut by
notifications.deban: was unbanned from this donut by

dropdown.op: You are now moderator of #__roomname__
dropdown.deop: You are not moderator of #__roomname__
dropdown.kick: You are kicked of #__roomname__
dropdown.ban: You are banned of #__roomname__
dropdown.deban: You are not banned of #__roomname__
dropdown.roomjoin: @__username__ join #__roomname__
dropdown.usermention: You are notified in #__roomname__

chat.shouldauthenticated: You must be logged in to access chat (signup or login)
chat.closemessage: Are you sure you want to leave? Your conversation log will be lost.
chat.kickmessage: You have been kicked out of __name__
chat.bannedfromroom: Unable to join __name__, you were banned
chat.roomnotexists: The donut __name__ does not exist yet, would you like to create it?
chat.alreadyexists: Donut __name__ already exists, would you like to join it?

owner.label: Creator
owner.help: The donut creator has all priviledges

ops.label: Moderators
ops.help: Moderators can change the donut topic, kick or ban users and make/remove moderators

bans.label: Banned
bans.help: Banned users cannot join this donut any longer

users.label: Users
users.help: Users of the donut can only view and post messages

share.label: share:
share.title: Come to discuss with me in the donut __name__
share.description: Join me on DONUT.me, the new chat platform. I discuss on __name__.

room: Welcome in __name__. Only users that have joined this donut (listed on right) can see the conversation. Even if they are currently offline.
Post a message to start the conversation.
onetoone: If __username__ isn't online he will get your messages on his next connexion
Post a message to start the conversation.

connection.contactus: Often problems to connect to us?

message.text-spammed: Message tagged as junk by moderator [Show]

error.invalid: Sorry, this account does not exist or the password is not valid

emailandpassword.label: E-mail and password
emailandpassword.help: You have not set e-mail and password. To log in without Facebook or unlink your account from Facebook:

email.label: E-mail
email.success: Your new e-mail has been saved

error.alreadyexists: This e-mail is already used by another account

password.label: Your password
password.success: Your new password has been saved.

error.confirm: Pass two passwords are not the same.
error.length: Password should have at least 6 characters length.

facebook.label: Facebook
facebook.help: Your account is linked this Facebook account:
facebook.name: Name
facebook.linkhelp: You can link your account to Facebook to log in more easily and enjoy a more social experience:

error.needemailpassword: You cannot unlink this account from Facebook. First you need to set an e-mail and a password for your account
error.alreadylinked: This Facebook account is already linked to another account

delete.success: Account successfully deleted, see you soon!

upload.done: Upload successful, please wait during image rendering

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: Describe the donut in a few words

bio.label: Bio
bio.placeholder: Describe yourself in a few words

website.label: Website
website.placeholder: URL of a website related to this account

poster.label: Poster
poster.help: The poster is the large vertical image on the right-hand side of the chat thread. Recommended dimensions: 430px width, 975px height.

visibility.label: Visibility (admin only)
visibility.true: This donut is displayed on homepage
visibility.false: This donut is not displayed on homepage

delete.link: To delete this donut click here.
delete.title: Delete
info: You are about to delete this donut. This action is immediate and cannot be undone.
To confirm deletion please enter donut name (__name__) and then click the button:

error.permanent: It is not possible to delete a 'permanent' donut

content.ps: P.S.: To avoid receiving these notification types, please uncheck it from your notification options in your account preferences on __fqdn__. For any question, we are available on #support

welcome.subject: Welcome to DONUT.me! Your account was successfully created

content.title: Welcome to DONUT !
content.disclaimer: Congratulations! Your user account was successfully created. Now you can join us and chat around a tasty donut by clicking right here

content.title: Password reset on DONUT.me
content.disclaimer: You are receiving this e-mail because you have requested a password reset. Please click on the following link to complete the process
content.info: If you ignore this e-mail your password will remain unchanged

passwordchanged.subject: Success ! Your password has been successfully changed

content.title: Password update
content.disclaimer: You are receiving this e-mail as the final confirmation of your password change. Let's go back to DONUT.me and join tasty conversations!

emailchanged.subject: Success ! The e-mail linked to your DONUT.me account has been successfully changed

content.title: Email update
content.disclaimer: You are receiving this e-mail because you requested to change the e-mail linked to yout DONUT.me account. It worked perfectly! You can use it to log in:

welcome.subject: Welcome to DONUT.me! Your account was successfully created.
text: Congratulations! Your user account was successfully created.
Now you can join us and chat around a tasty donut by clicking right here:
PS : If you did not initiate this action, please report by forwarding this e-mail to __email__ or replying this e-mail.
html: Congratualations! Your user account was successfully created.
Now you can join us and chat around a tasty donut by clicking right here:
PS : If you did not initiate this action, please report by forwarding this e-mail to __email__ or replying this e-mail.

forgot.subject: Password reset on DONUT.me
text: You are receiving this e-mail because you have requested a password reset. Please click on the following link to complete the process
If you ignore this e-mail your password will remain unchanged.
PS : If you did not initiate this action, please report by forwarding this e-mail to __email__ or replying this e-mail.
html: You are receiving this e-mail because you have requested a password reset. Please click on the following link to complete the process:
If you ignore this e-mail your password will remain unchanged.
PS : If you did not initiate this action, please report by forwarding this e-mail to __email__ or replying this e-mail.

PS : If you did not initiate this action, please report by forwarding this e-mail to __email__ or replying this e-mail.

message: DONUT is in pre-launch phase. We tried our best to offer you the friendliest experience but you probably have an idea how to make things even better. Drop us a line on #donut.
Let's get started! Pick a donut and chat with people sharing your interests:
welcome.donotshowagain: Do not show this message again

contactform.title: Contact us
contactform.name: Your name
contactform.sent: Success! Message sent, we'll reply as soon as possible.
contactform.fail: Unable to send email, retry later.

welcome.title: Window of welcome
welcome.label-true: Display welcome pop-up i log in

sounds.label-true: Play a ringtone when a new message arrives

help.user: DONUT tries to limit smartly the amount of emails and mobile notifications. However if you find that we send too many notification feel free to send your feedback by email or on #Support

nothing.label: Ne recevoir aucune notification pour ce donut

channels.title: Notify me on:
channels.desktop-default: Your browser will prompt for approval : approve !
channels.desktop-refused: You have chosen to refuse notifications on the desktop. To modify this choice , you must modifiers preferences of your browser.
channels.desktop-validated: You have chosen to accept notifications on the desktop. To modify this choice , you must modifiers preferences of your browser.

events.title: Notify me about:
events.infos: Notify me when (only applies to this donut) :

usermessage.label: when a user sends me a private message

roominvite.label: when a user invites me to join a donut

roommessage.label: a user posts a message in this donut

usermention.label: a user mentions me in this donut

roompromote.label: I am promoted, kicked of banned from this donut

roomtopic.label: a user changes the topic of this donut
